metadata.title: CVE-2024-3096 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
password_verify can erroneously return true, opening ATO risk

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-3096` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache2-mod-php8.3 - 8.3.6-0maysync1
libphp8.3-embed - 8.3.6-0maysync1
php8.3 - 8.3.6-0maysync1
php8.3-bcmath - 8.3.6-0maysync1

criterions.comment: php8.3 package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8.3.6-0maysync1').
